trigger.name: Error Temp Exp Bay Drive on {HOSTNAME} (HW)

Error Temp HD Cntlr Zone on {HOSTNAME} (HW)

Error Temp LOM Card Zone on {HOSTNAME} (HW)
Error Temp AHCI HD Max on {HOSTNAME} (HW)

Power Supplies not fully redundant on {HOSTNAME} (HW)

trigger.expression: {IPMI_HPDL380G10:Fan1.last()}<>1 or {IPMI_HPDL380G10:Fan2.last()}<>1 or {IPMI_HPDL380G10:Fan3.last()}<>1 or {IPMI_HPDL380G10:Fan4.last()}<>1 or {IPMI_HPDL380G10:Fan5.last()}<>1 or {IPMI_HPDL380G10:Fan6.last()}<>1 or {IPMI_HPDL380G10:Fans.last()}<>1
trigger.name: Error FANS on {HOSTNAME}

trigger.expression: {IPMI_HPDL380G10:80-PCI1M2.last()}>80 or {IPMI_HPDL380G10:82-PCI2M2.last()}>80 or {IPMI_HPDL380G10:84-PCI3M2.last()}>80 or {IPMI_HPDL380G10:86-PCI4M2.last()}>80 or {IPMI_HPDL380G10:88-PCI5M2.last()}>80 or {IPMI_HPDL380G10:90-PCI6M2.last()}>80 or {IPMI_HPDL380G10:92-PCI7M2.last()}>80 or {IPMI_HPDL380G10:94-PCI8M2.last()}>80
trigger.name: Error Temp PCI M2 on {HOSTNAME} (HW)

mapping.newvalue: Consistency Check / Parity Check in progress
Correctable ECC / other correctable memory error logging limit r
Transition to Critical from less severe
Transition to Non-recoverable from less severe
Transition to Non-Critical from more severe
